mapper.select: SELECT event_id, user_id, event_title, event_content, event_start_date, event_end_date, cat_id, CASE WHEN event_end_date < CURDATE() OR event_start_date > CURDATE() THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS event_status FROM event ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT #{param1} OFFSET #{param2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(event_title, user_id, event_content, cat_id, event_start_date, event_end_date, event_status) VALUES(#{event_title},#{user_id},#{event_content},#{cat_id},#{event_start_date},#{event_end_date}, #{event_status})
mapper.select: SELECT e.event_id, e.user_id, e.event_title,event_date ,e.event_content, e.event_start_date, e.event_end_date ,p.photo_id, p.photo_name FROM event e left JOIN photo p ON e.event_id = p.identify_number WHERE e.event_id = #{param1} AND e.cat_id = 'e'
